title: Laser cooling of organic–inorganic lead halide perovskites
title_cn: 激光冷却有机-无机卤化铅钙钛矿
abstract: Optical irradiation with suitable energy can cool solids, a phenomenon known as optical refrigeration, first proposed in 1929 and experimentally achieved in ytterbium-doped glasses in 1995. Since then, considerable progress has been made in various rare earth element-doped materials, with a recent record of cooling to 91 K directly from ambient temperatures. For practical use and to suit future applications of optical refrigeration, the discovery of materials with facile and scalable synthesis and high cooling power density will be required. Herein we present the realization of a net cooling of 23.0 K in micrometre-thick 3D CH3NH3PbI3 (MAPbI3) and 58.7 K in exfoliated 2D (C6H5C2H4NH3)2PbI4 (PhEPbI4) perovskite crystals directly from room temperature. We found that the perovskite crystals exhibit strong photoluminescence upconversion and near unity external quantum efficiency, properties that are responsible for the realization of net laser cooling. Our findings indicate that solution-processed perovskite thin films may be a highly suitable candidate for constructing integrated optical cooler devices.
abstract_cn: 用合适的能量进行光辐射可以冷却固体，这种现象称为光学制冷，该现象于1929年首次提出，并于1995年在掺-玻璃中通过实验实现。此后，在各种掺稀土元素的材料方面取得了长足的进步，最近的一项记录是直接从环境温度降到91＆＃8197; K。为了实际应用并适合光学制冷的未来应用，将需要发现具有容易且可扩展的合成和高冷却功率密度的材料。在这里，我们介绍了在微米级3D CH 3 NH 3 PbI 3 （MAPbI）中实现23.0＆＃8197; K的净冷却的实现。剥落的二维（C 6 H 5 C 2 H 中的 3 ）和58.7＆＃8197; K > 4 NH 3 ） 2 PbI 4 （PhEPbI 4 ）钙钛矿晶体直接从室温开始。我们发现钙钛矿晶体表现出强的光致发光上转换和接近统一的外部量子效率，这些特性是实现净激光冷却的原因。我们的研究结果表明，固溶钙钛矿薄膜可能是构建集成光学冷却器设备的高度合适的选择。

title: Coordinate-targeted fluorescence nanoscopy with multiple off states
title_cn: 具有多个关闭状态的坐标靶向荧光纳米技术
abstract: Far-field super-resolution fluorescence microscopy discerns fluorophores residing closer than the diffraction barrier by briefly transferring them in different (typically ON and OFF) states before detection. In coordinate-targeted super-resolution variants, such as stimulated emission depletion (STED) microscopy, this state difference is created by the intensity minima and maxima of an optical pattern, causing all fluorophores to assume the off state, for instance, except at the minima. Although strong spatial confinement of the on state enables high resolution, it also subjects the fluorophores to excess intensities and state cycles at the maxima. Here, we address these issues by driving the fluorophores into a second off state that is inert to the excess light. By using reversibly switchable fluorescent proteins as labels, our approach reduces bleaching and enhances resolution and contrast in live-cell STED microscopy. Using two or more transitions to off states is a useful strategy for augmenting the power of coordinate-targeted super-resolution microscopy.
abstract_cn: 远场超分辨率荧光显微镜通过在检测之前短暂地将其转移到不同的状态（通常为ON和OFF）来识别比衍射屏障更近的荧光团。在以坐标为目标的超分辨率变量中，例如受激发射损耗（STED）显微镜，这种状态差异是由光学图案的强度最小值和最大值所造成的，例如，除了在极小值。尽管对打开状态的强空间限制可以实现高分辨率，但它也使荧光团处于最大强度和状态循环。在这里，我们通过将荧光团驱动到对多余的光呈惰性的第二关闭状态来解决这些问题。通过使用可逆转换的荧光蛋白作为标记，我们的方法减少了漂白，并提高了活细胞STED显微镜的分辨率和对比度。使用两个或多个过渡到关闭状态是增强以坐标为目标的超分辨率显微镜功能的有用策略。

title: High-gain infrared-to-visible upconversion light-emitting phototransistors
title_cn: 高增益红外至可见光上转换发光光电晶体管
abstract: Infrared-to-visible upconversion devices made by integrating an infrared quantum dot photodetector with an organic light-emitting diode potentially offer a route to low-cost, pixel-free infrared imaging. However, making such devices sufficiently efficient for practical use is a challenge. Here, we report a high-gain vertical phototransistor with a perforated metallic source electrode having an EQE up to 1 × 105% and a detectivity of 1.2 × 1013 Jones. By incorporating a phosphorescent organic light-emitting diode in this phototransistor, an infrared-to-visible upconversion LEPT with a photon-to-photon conversion efficiency of over 1,000% is demonstrated.
abstract_cn: 通过将红外量子点光电探测器与有机发光二极管集成在一起制成的红外到可见光上转换器件有可能为低成本，无像素的红外成像提供一条途径。 然而，使这种装置对于实际使用足够有效是一个挑战。 在这里，我们报告了一种高增益垂直光电晶体管，其带孔金属源电极的EQE高达1＆＃8201;＆＃215;＆＃8201; 10 5 ％，检测度为1.2＆＃ 8201;＆＃215;＆＃8201; 10 13 ＆＃8197;琼斯。 通过在该光电晶体管中集成磷光有机发光二极管，证明了从红外到可见光的上转换LEPT具有超过1000％的光子到光子转换效率。
